Mounted Police Post of L Division

With the outlines of its shadowy white walls and dark roof silhouetted in sharp relief against a glorious full moon, the big main building of the old Mounted Police Post of L Division stood forth--like a lone monument to the majesty of British Law.
Benton of the Royal Mounted: A Tale of the Royal Northwest Mounted Police
